page.title: 18A DAY AWAY FROM BALBY
page.content: On 26th June 1985 my family and I took part in a very notable religious and social event with many others from the area. The evangelist Billy Graham came to Sheffield United' Football Stadium to preach. My whole family went. We dressed in our best clothes. When we reached the stadium we found our seats. There were many people there. A choir sang a song then Billy Graham began to preach to us. It was so quiet you could hear a pin drop. At about 9pm he said, "come doen, confess your sins."Many people did. We received some gifts on the way out. It was late when we arrived home. We slept in and did not go to school the next day. It was worth it for all the family it was magic.
